explains: v. （使）减少，（使）降低（decrease 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: on the decrease 在减少中

sentences.en: The price of wheat has decreased by 15%.
The number of new students decreased from 210 to 160 this year.
sentences.cn: 今年新生人数从210减少到160。

sentences.en: Fatal road accidents have decreased in frequency over recent years.
sentences.cn: 近年来致命交通事故发生率已经下降。
